participant_1.background:

i am married and have 2 kids.

participant_2.background:
I will be spending time in my garden, tending to my roses and enjoying the fresh air.
my grandchildren range in age from 30 to 7.
I will continue to follow my passion and live my life to the fullest, even if others don't understand or approve.
my favorite animal is the koala.
I am not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do know that I love jello.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well too! I'm a bit bored, so I'm just chatting with people on a new social media app.
That's cool! I'm not really into social media, but I'm always up for a good conversation.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love gardening, I have a beautiful rose garden that I spend a lot of time tending to.
That sounds lovely! I love flowers, but I don't have a green thumb.
It's not hard to learn! Just start with some easy plants and you'll be a pro in no time.
I might just have to give it a try! What else do you like to do?
I love spending time with my grandchildren, they're the light of my life.
That's so sweet! I have two kids of my own, but they're all grown up now.
I know what you mean, it goes by so fast! I'm so glad I got to spend so much time with them when they were young.
Me too! I'm sure they'll appreciate it when they're older.
I'm sure they will! So, what else do you like to do?
I like to go fishing, I find it very relaxing.
That sounds like fun! I've never been fishing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
